Name: Eduardo
description:
Eduardo is 59 years old and studied through the third grade. He is in a relationship and his partner works as a household domestic. They have a grown son who is independent. Eduardo and his partner live by themselves.

He has more than 15 years of experience in agriculture. Eduardo learned this trade from his aunt. He must travel 100 meters to reach the place where his crops are located. His work schedule is from 7:00 A.M. to 12:00 P.M. In the afternoons, he works as a day laborer.

Eduardo will use this loan to buy farming supplies, such as fertilizers and composts, which will help develop and provide nutrition for his crop of corn. He dreams of earning a stable income from farming so that he can improve his current household conditions.
